tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_firewall_rules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    port INT,
    action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE firewall_rules (
  rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rule_name VARCHAR(255),
  source_ip VARCHAR(15),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
  protocol VARCHAR(10),
  port INT
);

CREATE TABLE rule_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rule_id INT,
  log_time TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES firewall_rules(rule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_firewall_rules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_description TEXT,
    source_ip_address TEXT,
    destination_ip_address TEXT,
    protocol TEXT,
    port INT
);

CREATE TABLE firewall_rules_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_id INT,
    group_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES network_firewall_rules (rule_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES firewall_groups (group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE firewall_rules (
    rule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    port INT,
    action VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE rule_categories (
    category_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE rule_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_id INT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP,
    log_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE rule_permissions (
    permission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    permission_type VARCHAR(10)
)
